statements: SELECT * FROM credit_risk_prediction;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_risk_prediction ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM credit_risk_prediction;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM credit_risk_prediction GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, repayment_history FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_risk_prediction WHERE loan_amount > 50000 AND repayment_history LIKE '%delinquent%';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, repayment_history, credit_score FROM credit_risk_prediction ORDER BY credit_score ASC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT credit_score, loan_amount FROM customer_data WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, repayment_date FROM loan_repayment_data WHERE repayment_status = 'Paid' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, age, loan_amount FROM customer_data JOIN loan_repayment_data ON customer_data.customer_id = loan_repayment_data.customer_id WHERE loan_repayment_data.repayment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, credit_score, loan_amount FROM customer_data WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loan_amount FROM customer_data WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT customer_name, age, loan_amount FROM customer_data ORDER BY age ASC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, l.repayment_date, l.repayment_status FROM customer_data c JOIN loan_repayment_data l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id WHERE l.repayment_status = 'paid';
SELECT * FROM loans
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans
SELECT loan_id, loan_status, loan_start_date, loan_end_date FROM loans
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_history FROM credit_scores
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'APPROVED' AND interest_rate > 5
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE repayment_status = 'IN_PROGRESS' ORDER BY loan_start_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number, email FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, credit_score, credit_history FROM customers JOIN credit_scores ON customers.customer_id = credit_scores.customer_id WHERE credit_score > 700
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id WHERE loans.loan_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT application_id, loan_amount, approval_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT customer_name, age, employment_status FROM CustomerData WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM CustomerData WHERE employment_status = 'Employed' AND credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, repayment_date, amount_paid FROM LoanRepayments WHERE amount_paid < 5000 ORDER BY repayment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT application_id, loan_amount, approval_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';

SELECT CustomerData.customer_name, CustomerData.age, LoanApplications.loan_amount FROM CustomerData JOIN LoanApplications ON CustomerData.customer_id = LoanApplications.customer_id WHERE CustomerData.age > 30;
SELECT LoanRepayments.repayment_id, LoanRepayments.repayment_date, CustomerData.customer_name FROM LoanRepayments JOIN CustomerData ON LoanRepayments.customer_id = CustomerData.customer_id;

SELECT CustomerData.customer_name, CustomerData.credit_score, CreditHistory.credit_rating FROM CustomerData JOIN CreditHistory ON CustomerData.customer_id = CreditHistory.customer_id WHERE CustomerData.credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, approval_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScore WHERE late_payments >= 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RepaymentHistory WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, loan_amount, late_payments FROM CreditScore WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT assessment_id, customer_id, risk_score, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
